about_the_game:
Hello everyone, thank you so much for your help and support. Now we are bring out a different DLC, which is not about the Story, it combines all the mini-games in previous Chapters. Let's just break out from a tangled web of the Story, and enjoy the pleasure of mini-games. Also there is a leaderboard in the game, and let's fight for becoming the strongest company man of Titan.

The Contents of this DLC:
  • Hack Servers
  • Hack City Station
  • Hack Terminal Device
  • Hack Network Line
  • Steal Voiceprint
  • Public Opinion

⚠️YOU CAN ENTER THE NEW DLC FROM "A Company Man" BUTTON IN THE GAME⚠️
detailed_description:
ATTENTION

⚠️If you cannot play this DLC after updating the game, please click "Download" button in the Page.⚠️


About the Game


Hello everyone, thank you so much for your help and support. Now we are bring out a different DLC, which is not about the Story, it combines all the mini-games in previous Chapters. Let's just break out from a tangled web of the Story, and enjoy the pleasure of mini-games. Also there is a leaderboard in the game, and let's fight for becoming the strongest company man of Titan.

The Contents of this DLC:
  • Hack Servers
  • Hack City Station
  • Hack Terminal Device
  • Hack Network Line
  • Steal Voiceprint
  • Public Opinion

⚠️YOU CAN ENTER THE NEW DLC FROM "A Company Man" BUTTON IN THE GAME⚠️

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.8 Mountain Lion
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X 10.8 Mountain Lion
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Cyber Manhunt - A Company Man of Titan

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i3-3220
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 610
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-3470
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 630
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card

short_description: It combines all the mini-games in Cyber Manhunt. Let's just break out from a tangled web of the Story, and enjoy the pleasure of mini-games. Also there is a leaderboard in the game, and let's fight for becoming the strongest company man of Titan.
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, English*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
